text: Ara tini balalena, ‘he amara putragana! Tomara eka daraja diye prabesa karo na, bhinna bhinna daraja diye prabesa karabe [1]. Allah‌ra sid'dhantera biparite ami tomadera jan'ya kichu karate pari na. Hukumera malika to allahi. Ami tamra'i upara nirbhara kari. Ara allahra'i upara yena nirbharakarira nirbhara kare [2].’
